text:
今年度よりウェブ上での回答となり、全ご家庭がアンケート対象となっておりました。
今年度は時間がなくご回答いただけなかったり、忘れてしまっていたご家庭もあるかと思いますが、毎年このように頂いたご意見について職員全員で話し合い、よりよい園にするための大切な機会としていきたいため、次年 度はぜひご回答をお願い致します。
改善案について何かございましたら各担任ではなく直接園長までお話いただきますようお願い致します。
trans:
From this year, responses have been moved online, and all households were asked to participate in the survey.
We understand that some families might not have had the time or may have forgotten to respond this year. However, the feedback we receive every year is a valuable opportunity for all staff members to discuss and work toward making the nursery a better place. Therefore, please participate in the survey next year.
If you have any suggestions for improvements, please address them directly to the principal rather than your child's homeroom teacher.
